<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset provides historical metrics on the global behavior of surface water measured over the full extent of the GSW dataset.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`maxExtent`|Maximum extent of surface water|
|`permanentWater`|Maximum extent of permanent water|
|`seasonalFrequency`|Maximum extent of seasonal water|
</div>

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resoluton
list_data("GSW_history")


# data call for specific subdataset

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("GSW_history/maxExtent/300m")
```
